website_summaries.verdict: A dual-screen DVD and CD player by a popular brand in audio equipment. Quality control and customer service could be better, however.
pros: Set includes two 10.5-inch monitors that deliver vivid picture quality
Although it comes with subpar instructions, setup is straightforward
Bracket system is durable and provides reliable stability

customer_reviews.title: Receive the part with two monitors wrapped in grocery bags.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write bad reviews, but I receive the “new” product with two monitors wrapped in grocery bags (see attached pictures). This is so bad. And this is my replacement order, the original order was received with one tv cannot be turned on.
customer_reviews.author: kai zhang

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: We've have used these on a few road trips already and are REALLY happy! The install was a breeze, the monitor quality is great and they even come with a premium looking leather cover for each screen. We read lots of reviews and are so pleased with this purchase. We've purchased other brands previously I Best Buy for a much higher price that barley lasted 6 months before the cables became faulty. This product though? I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poor Pyle Quality--Just Like Old Times
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was excellent. Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Disappointed in lack of instructions. One major problem I had was one of the the 12 volt plugs would not seat into power receptive on one of the DVD players. When comparing to the second power cord, it's obvious the end plug is much longer than it should be. This is why it doesn't seat and player won't turn on. Additionally, had to mess around with headset for a bit to get it to connect to the DVD player that worked. Headsets don't fit toddlers well. My first Pyle dealing since their junk reputation from the '90s. Seems not much has changed.
customer_reviews.author: Toga

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!! Fix the glitch with second screen.
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these. Picture was clear, great set up on head rest. I wish it had turned from side to side. But we used it in a Transit Van and it worked great. We had one in the second row and one in the front row. Cables were plenty long. Remotes are a little high maintenance...really busy. But I get that they're for video gaming. Love the ability to look at two different movies at once. With older and younger kids, this feature comes in super handy! Unfortunately, one of our screens stopped working midway through our trip so we had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: R & G J

customer_reviews.title: Headrest Bracket Doesn't fit on thick Posts
customer_reviews.text: Good: The DVD player starts up faster than my previous DDAUTO. The picture quality is good. Hooking up the wire harness is fairly easy. The screen cover is useful. Reasonable in price. Bad: the headrest bracket is not made to fit thick posts. You would need longer screws. But it's not included. I emailed support and it has been two weeks with no solution (bad support). The instruction manual has no details on the setting, such which feature does what. I struggled just to get the headphones and the wiring harness output to work. The buttons/wording on the remote control are small and hard to use. Couldn't get the MPEG4 to work on the SD card.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to direct wire!
customer_reviews.text: I love that we don't have to have cords hanging down for the kids to get tangled up in. We can leave them hard wired and still take them in and out of the car for use in the home or another vehicle with the power cords.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Fehr

customer_reviews.title: To dificult to operate
customer_reviews.text: It's a DVD player not a spaceship. Bought theses for my grand kids , takes a rocket scientist to operate . more buttons on the remote than in the space shuttle. A simple on/off play/stop would be great but nooooooo lets make it as difficult as possible. I would give them to someone else and buy something different but no one has pissed me off enough to give it to them
customer_reviews.author: larry b clark

customer_reviews.title: The headphones don't work.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones don't work. Tried to contact manufacturer on chat and they treated me like I was trying to get a refund on an old purchase. Ask me for proof of when I purchased. After sending the photo proof, never heard back. I just wanted some assistance getting the headphones to work. The remotes can't be used in the car together either. One remote operates both players. = pissed off kids when one kid's movie gets restarted by the other kid by mistake. Trip was not pleasant. Had to purchase wired headphones and not use remotes. Defeated the purpose of the purchase. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kat-belue

customer_reviews.title: DVD players are less than a year old (9 months) and do not work.
customer_reviews.text: One of the DVD players stopped work after only 9 months of very light use. They are not used very much unless we travel, which is very often. I changed out the plug with the other DVD player but it still does not stay powered up. When I hit a bump the DVD player turns off. If you move the plug around at the side of the player sometimes it will power back on. There is something internally defective with the DVD player. I tried submitting a return ticket to get a replacement but seller has not responded.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hood

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WORKS AND PLAYS GREAT. VERY EASY TO INSTALL. THE ONLY COMPLAINT IS THAT THE PART THAT HOLDS THE SCREEN TO THE HEAD REST DOESN'T HOLD THE SCREEN IN PLACE ANYMORE. IT DOESN'T LATCH. SO SOMETIMES THE WHOLE THING FALLS OFF INTO THE BACK SEAT. IT WAS WORKING BUT ONLY AFTER A WEEK FOR SOME REASON DOESN'T LATCH ANYMORE.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, manual not clear for headphones
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. Not very user friendly when setting the wireless headphones, but got them to work after messing around for a while. One of the players does not stay upright and keeps dropping down slightly. My daughter ends up taking the player off the mount and holds it. Overall happy with the product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Each player can play its own movie...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the way they mount on the headrests. Easy to remove from the mount without removing the mounting hardware. My grand children were able to watch different movies with the headphones on. Needed to purchase a cigarette lighter adapter because each screen has it's own power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Dale

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! The volume is super loud which we all know is a plus when it comes to road noise completing with inside sound. The picture is gorgeous, and it is so easy to install! Easy to use, and just really a great product all around. I'm excited to see how it holds up to our 23+ hr car trips with our 2 toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is product is easy to install although the installation manual does not do justice to how the headphones works. I had to kick in my curiosity skills which led me to fondling with the remote. Once Batter has been install in the head phones and remote, select the switch on the side to A(red light) for one HP and B (green light) for 2nd HP. To activate the IR function, select TFT Menu on then remote and go to sound then select IR and forward arrow to activate.
customer_reviews.author: Adebola

customer_reviews.title: Overall loving this DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: Still very new and we are learning it, still haven’t figured out how to make the headphones work yet, but i also haven’t had time to get in the back seat and mess with it very much. The reader is pretty sensitive, which makes for a great picture, but also if there are any scratches At all, it pixelates very easily. I love being able to play 2 different movies, and the controls are on the front and are touch operated so my 3 year old can start her win movie when needed, so that’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Super Simple and started right up
customer_reviews.text: It took me 5 minutes to set up and you will need 2 seperate lighter power inputs. Put DVD right in and started playing. Remote works fine. Have not tried the wireless headphones yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: One worked, One did not work.
customer_reviews.text: one player works , the other has an inside out, reversed image. The headphones are to large to fit on my kids' heads and my wife's head. No instructions on hookup or troubleshooting. I am going to attempt to return, although it hasn't been as easy as other items I've returned.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Matthews

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have not unlocked the potential yet but have one screen working. I will need an attachment to get both screens working. I like what I see so far and need to get all the wires and headphones working but like what I see. I may need to get a speaker for the third row of seats or else move one of the monitors in the back of the minivan so all my children can hear and see. The real test will come during our NY to Seattle trip next month but this product should make the trip more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far it been working great no issues, picture quality is great as well. it took me less than 10 minutes to install on my Audi Q7. My only complaint would be that the instruction booklet is not very detailed, but after some poking around I manage to set up the headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in 2019 Kia Sorento
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked this up and was easy to hook on headrest but I didn't hardwire it. Seems like a great product, one of the headphones had a little static but not bad. I just wish it had better instructions on how to work it and some of the functions. So far I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for long trips
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it was very easy to mount. The picture is really clear and my kids like it. A couple of downfalls are that the cigarette charger should be a splitter with two connections instead of one per player. The headphones are very flimsy and one of them tends to cut off sounds with minimal movement. Really wish they made a blu ray player but the HMDI input is pretty cool. Also, better instructions on connecting the players together would be great instead trying to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never hear "How much further?" again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that made the trip quieter than expected. The kids were all into the movies and all we heard was laughter. Thank you for the well built products and the easy install instructions. I highly recommend this dvd player for everyone's vehicle who transports backseat passengers. -Chris W.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These worked great the first 5 months with minor hick ups other than the headphones never hooking up but now they no longer power on at all. We’ve tried everything and nothing works. So now we’re out the $$ and DVD player for trips. And of course the return window and help has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had it a month and it broke, went to turn it on and it started smoking and burning filled my whole vehicle with smoke. Called to get it replaced and they won’t do it all they will do is provide me with a shipping label to return and refund my money back eventually
customer_reviews.author: Bradley04

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: I received mine with scratched screens as if they were used and not new units. Both DVDs didn't work. I have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Packing debris and live bug under screen.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the sealed package, and removing the monitor, we tried to dust off the packing debris and found it was under the screen. Also under the screen was a small crawling bug. All of the product was repackaged and taken to garage to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Voress

customer_reviews.title: Videos on a jump drive will be a problem
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install to the car seat, but remotes work on both tv so it’s hard to use the remotes, mp4 videos would not play and you have no instructions so setting up headphones was very difficult. I returned these due to the fact that I purchased to watch videos on a jump drive and formatting issues kept me from watching anything!
customer_reviews.author: laura brame cerra

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two daughters, it worked perfect because one is still rear facing so I am able to have both kids watching a different video. I love that the DVD's insert on the top and the buttons to control each screen are on the front where my oldest can work it on her own. The only problem I am having is getting the headphones to connect wirelessly like it says they do.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation process and great picture quality compared to others
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased another brand, then returned it due to picture quality. Pyle has far superior quality and very easy to install. If your'e adding another device using HDMI, a bit more complicated but very doable if tech savvy. Great product for the price and came with headphones (2 pair) which is a plus for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY V.

customer_reviews.title: System sucks but pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: The wireless headphones will not connect. Had to get a replacement because the head phones didn’t connect. Even the second one they won’t. Other than that their nice. The whole reason I wanted this system is because of the wireless head phones. The most important part was that to me and that feature absolutely sucks on this system
customer_reviews.author: natosha

customer_reviews.title: Pyle TV not worth it. Bad product no support
customer_reviews.text: Installed TVs in car and 1 of them does not work just keeps giving ERR DISK. Spent a hour troubleshooting with rep only to be told that they would have a more experienced troubleshooter call me back today. No call.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Trips will be a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Best headrest attachment design I have seen. Super easy to install. Trips will be a breeze with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: We got these to replace our old car DVD players. The mounting brackets are so easy to put on and the fact that the DVD's load from the top, they can't get bounced around. Each child can watch their own movies and the wireless headphones work really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The DVD part works but the wireless headsets do not and cannot get the movies to play from a flash drive either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I should know, when I receive my refund??? I sent it back 1,5 month ago!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is that it was supposed to come with 2 wireless headphones and only 1 came in the box. They couldn't just send me a headset so the options were either discount or full replacement of product. Otherwise, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: CMF

customer_reviews.title: Super great and easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product was really easy to install and shows a great picture. Even though I think that this product is outstanding, the picture quality takes a hit due to there being a bit of a glare. Even with that, I would happily purchase this product again. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Blair

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and we really like the versatility of audio output (IR headphones, FM, or speakers). This is great for a long car trip! Note that this player can not play Blu-ray discs.
customer_reviews.author: adwoa74

customer_reviews.title: great product  grandkids love
customer_reviews.text: we are very happy with this DVD set for our new jeep. Grandkids love it, and they don't have to fight over the DVDs they watch with dual screens now. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features....
customer_reviews.text: I have two little boys. This was perfect for them. When I got it I wasn’t expecting all the features it had. I just seen a dual DVD player for car and purchased. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dotts

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the $
customer_reviews.text: TVs are really nice. Thought the headphones were wireless. It doesn’t seem to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly noble

customer_reviews.title: Hiding the wires can be tricky.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality!!. My kids are really enjoying it. Love that they can watch different movies at the same time
customer_reviews.author: andew mack

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one car trip.
customer_reviews.text: Worked in November for a car trip. We just tried to use them for a car trip today and one of the monitors is completely unresponsive and broke. I don’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than top mounted DVD players that cost around a $1,000.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install! Solid mounting brackets and different options for powering them up. Need better written instructions for initial programming, but was able to figure it out using remotes.
customer_reviews.author: martin divis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved the fact that they are tough screen and can be played independently of the pair with headphones.
customer_reviews.author: MROD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Excellent for two kids and them being able to watch whatever they choose. Elimates the arguments. Great quality for the price! Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: One of my screens has 2 Lines going through it. The other is perfect though. Directions are a little Hard to follow with headphone setup
customer_reviews.author: terran

customer_reviews.title: Headphones were an issue but figured them out
customer_reviews.text: The only issue was the headphones, took a little bit to figure out but once we did everything worked great! Definitely recommend for the car ride to Florida!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Only used it 2 days but so far so good. No directions for it but I am tech savvy enough to figure out connecting the DVD player and connecting the IR headphones was missing the smaller remote control
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Box came damaged but dry (snowing outside when package arrived)
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged but the contents were just fine. Haven’t installed yet, as it is a Christmas present for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Lines throughout picture quality/screen
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t even had it a year and the screen/picture quality has issues. There are lines through the picture at all times. Spent too much money for that to happen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great for anyone in back seat, no instructions is the only downfall
customer_reviews.author: Kae R Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great flexible system
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, not like cheap DVD players. Easy to install and use. Great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Gjovik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used much yet. Easy to install a manual would have been helpful, especially for the remote control setup/features.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen V.

customer_reviews.title: We need a longer charger!
customer_reviews.text: We love this high quality product! Our girls are going to enjoy watching movies on long trips! Our favorite thing is that they can watch the same, or different movies, at the same time. And the wireless headphones are just a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Britany Mosley Photography

customer_reviews.title: Received it and can't wait to see it working.
customer_reviews.text: I received my Universal Car Headrest Mount Monitor - 9.4 Inch Vehicle Multimedia CD DVD Player yesterday and I can wait to see it working!
customer_reviews.author: David Abarca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looking forward to traveling with the kids, knowing they will have something to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dean R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I’m even considering purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: Marcohhh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying portable DVD players. We kept bc my husband said it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Margis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working great so far and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. Hooked up and worked like a charm. Great price point. Beats paying thousands for an entertainment system in a new vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn A

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to friends
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Arrived early and my daughter loved it on our 6 hour trip to Minnesota!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, love that they entertain the kids on long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Soo Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The attachment to the headrest is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Collins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Item was packaged nicely, easy set up. Happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My kids like this product and we are looking to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Chirag gandhi

customer_reviews.text: Brought this in August. Both TV’s did not work. Got to return my order
customer_reviews.author: Amazobittn Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dvd players
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dvd players. Our kids love them and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Oziemkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Low quality headphones, no cable to other player
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install players, good headrest mounts. No Way to cable the top together, no cable provided, that’s why I bought these. DVD player seems fine so far, fm works great the headphones are very cheap which is surprising because the DVD players appear to be high quality...manual is very basic and does not include any examples of how to use remote. Easy to setup fm or ir headphones but headphones only work on one channel and are very spotty.. low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Berks

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After installing this set of DVD players in my van for my children to use, one player works about 50% of the time. The other works about 75% of the time. And, when they do work, it usually takes several minutes for the video to load completely before it plays. I had an old RCA set of DVD players that cost about 1/4 the price work beautifully for 9 years but wanted to upgrade to these for the wireless headphones capability. Lesson learned - keep it simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd try was the charm.
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with one of the screens the first time - buttons didn't respond. Customer service was great in troubleshooting. Got a replacement quickly. Instructions aren't almost non-existent but there is a video from Pyle online that helps figure out the power wiring. Again, no instructions - you have to put the discs in with the label away from the viewer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars if possible
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Took a few minutes to install and the kids love them. I'm not sure what others were complaining about. I've had other vehicles with factory installed audio/ video systems that don't compare to the quality of these.
customer_reviews.author: fasttruk

customer_reviews.title: DVD player didn’t work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product....it was packaged nicely and came in a timely manner. But when I got it all hooked up in the car I couldn’t play a DVD on either unit. I tried multiple disks but each time it would display a “disk error”. Never even tried the other outlets (usb, HDMI etc). I can’t give this a better rating than 1 star if it doesn’t do the basic function it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, headrest do not share pictures between the two, can't use game unit like Xbox, play station etc, nor can you share movies from a fire stick, half the time the DVD shared the picture and the other half it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just ok do your research.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the kids. You must be sitting directly in front of the screen or you have no Audio. Don’t forget how well DVD players work in bumpy or rough roads, they glitch and skip. The free gift they say you get when you review this product is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. The wiring harness is faulty and I could not get the second screen to show the picture. The harness was also shocking me. There must be a short in it. Guess it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: HooverADF

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great...
customer_reviews.text: But one of the cables wouldn’t work and we couldn’t get any of the digital movies to work. We tried various formats and they wouldn’t play.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, great picture, can either hardwire or plug into 12v. We chose the 12v route and the kids enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Van Jurney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Kept my 4 and 3 year old busy on our long journey
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Screens are perfect size and very clear. Kids love them and now we have a peaceful ride.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: bought two different times, broken both times paid extra extra >$50 to repair and now they are dead
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this item the power cord was dismantle and fried one of the screens. I reorders at a price $48 higher. With in 8 hours a fuse broken (no replacement) another 2 hours the other fuse blew. Pretty much expect them to break fast and not be usable. Customer service sent one email and ignored helping me out any further. Headphone quality was super poor. The business needed some major revamp with Quality Assurance and the management caring for the customers. My experience was awful. When I lost the $250 I should of just cut my losses and avoided the headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: We were very hesitant on buying these only because we have never heard of the brand before but we are very pleased with our purchase. We have only used them a couple times so far but we really like them. The picture and sound quality are great and the set up was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: nyree

product_meta.title: Universal Car Headrest Mount Monitor - 9.4 Inch Vehicle Multimedia CD DVD Player - Dual Audio Video Entertainment w/HDMI, Wide TV LCD Screen, Wireless Headphones & Mounting Bracket - Pyle PLHRDVD90KT
product_meta.description:
Pyle Model : PLHRDVD90KT

9.4" CAR HEADREST DVD PLAYER KIT
DUAL VEHICLE HEADREST MOUNT CD/DVD PLAYER SYSTEM - CAR VIDEO ENTERTAINMENT DISPLAY MONITORS WITH WIRELESS HEADPHONES (9.4’’ -INCH)
Features:Universal Vehicle Headrest Mount DisplaysDual Monitor Backseat EntertainmentTop-Loading CD/DVD PlayersHi-Res Digital LCD Wide-Screen VideoBuilt-in Stereo SpeakersHeadphone Jack, 3.5mmUSB Flash & SD Memory Card ReadersConvenient Removable Leather Screen CoverEasily Attaches to Front-Seat & Back-Seat HeadrestsHDMI Input Port & AV ConnectorConnect Additional Device via RCA (Audio/Video) Wiring HarnessBuilt-in IR Transmitter for Wireless IR Headphone UseFront Panel Button ControlsIntegrated FM TransmitterIncludes All Necessary Hardware & Cables for Installation*Can be Hard-Wired or Powered via Included Plug-in Cigarette Lighter Power Cable

Technical Specifications:Screen Size: 9.4 inches (x2)Video System: PAL / NTSC Compatible Auto SwitchingAspect Ratio: 16:9Screen Resolution: 800 x 480 PixelsContrast Ratio: 300:1Brightness: 350 cd/m2English OSD MenuMaximum USB/SD Card Size: 32GBCD/DVD Player Support: DVD/VCD/MP3/JPG/MP4/CD-R/CD-RWDigital File Compatibility: MP3, MP4, MP5, JPG, MPEG4, WMA, AVIBattery Operated Headphones, Requires (2) x 'AA' Batteries, Not IncludedBattery Operated Remote Control, Requires (2) x 'AAA' Batteries, Not IncludedPower Supply: DC 12VDimensions (L x W x H): 9.3'' x 6.2'' x 2.0’’ –inches
The Pyle Dual Vehicle Headrest Mount CD/DVD Player System - Car Video Entertainment Display Monitors with Wireless Headphones (9.4’’ -inch) - Universal Vehicle Headrest Mount Displays - Dual Monitor Backseat Entertainment - Top-Loading CD/DVD Players - Hi-Res Digital LCD Wide-Screen Video - Built-in Stereo Speakers - Headphone Jack, 3.5mm - USB Flash & SD Memory Card Readers - Convenient Removable Leather Screen Cover - Easily Attaches to Front-Seat & Back-Seat Headrests - HDMI Input Port & AV Connector - Connect Additional Device via RCA (Audio/Video) Wiring Harness - Built-in IR Transmitter for Wireless IR Headphone Use - Front Panel Button Controls - Integrated FM Transmitter - Includes All Necessary Hardware & Cables for Installation.
feature_bullets: 9.4” AUDIO VIDEO MONITOR: Perfect for long roadtrips, this dual headrest TV multimedia player system provides complete backseat entertainment. Hi-res LCD wide screen display with top-loading CD DVD player lets you watch movies or play games

WIRELESS HEADPHONES INCLUDED: The 9.4 inch touchscreen monitor comes with headphones and features HDMI input port to allow you to connect your phone, tablet, & other smart devices. Built-in stereo speakers ensure you’ll get quality sound at all times

SUPPORTS VARIOUS FORMATS: Compatible with various digital file formats such as MP3, MP4, WMA & AVI, giving your kids new level entertainment for short or long trips. Comes with USB flash & SD memory card readers for easy access to personal files

VERSATILE MEDIA PLAYER: Features RCA wiring harness to enable you to connect additional device, allowing your passengers to watch movie or play video games in the backseat. It has a built-in IR transmitter if you prefer to listen to music in peace

UNIVERSAL MOUNTING: The portable vehicle headrest mount player allows you to easily install the headrest posts into all of today’s car models. Also comes with everything you need - removable leather screen cover, mounting bracket, & remote control
